STATE OF NEW JERSEY
218th LEGISLATURE
PRE-FILED FOR INTRODUCTION IN THE 2018 SESSION

SYNOPSIS
Permits operation of low-speed electric bicycles.

CURRENT VERSION OF TEXT
Introduced Pending Technical Review by Legislative Counsel.
